name: Pixel Caverns
description:
Welcome, adventurer! The pixel caverns await you. Are you ready to embark on your epic journey into the unknown? Make your way through the underground realm, fight monsters, collect treasure and avoid traps. The only way is down. How deep can you descend before meeting the inevitable doom?

Check out this old school platformer shooter with cute graphics!

Credits:
Artwork by VEXED (some of the assets by myself)
Sound effects by phoenix1291, Baŝto and Muncheybobo
Music by ShwiggityShwag, Frenchyboy, 3dpyramid, Wolfgang and celestialghost8
Font by Brian Kent
